scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'Server,Models,Client' -c 'yellow,green,blue' 'pnpm  --filter=server run dev' 'pnpm  --filter=models run dev' 'pnpm  --filter=ui run dev'
scripts.format: prettier --write eslint.config.mts knip.json packages/*/src/**/*.{ts,svelte} packages/*/src/*.{ts,svelte,scss} packages/*/tests/**/*.ts packages/*/{tailwind.config.js,postcss.config.cjs,vite.config.ts,svelte.config.js}
